item.title: [317refactor] Player title showoff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:14, topic:550770”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=669681.msg4478005#msg4478005 date=1427406194]

hes the only one posting topics anyway the argument of merging topics is fudgeing retarded.
[/quote]not really; imagine the downloads section was dead and someone posted v1, v1.1, v1.2, v1.3, v1.4 of their server in a bunch of different topics, I dont see how the section not getting many posts would be relevant to how many topics you should make about your project

EDIT:
[i mg]http://puu.sh/gQSgz/0259aa0e06.jpg[/img]
[i mg]http://puu.sh/gQStw/20c189f030.png[/img]
One line of code

You’re using a client version with titles already implemented…[/quote]no Im not? Titles came out in like mid 2011, 530 is early 2009. There is some prefix/suffix feature in place (for internal testing I assume, because like I said there were no titles at the time), but I’m not even using that

Read full topic

item.title: [317refactor] Player title showoff
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:550770”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=669681.msg4478009#msg4478009 date=1427412215]
how is it a lot of code just send the title on the player updating and add it to the username client-sided. You can even just add it to the username server-sided also.
[/quote]isnt it base 37 username as long for updating? meaning you couldnt do it there[/quote]

You can just change it from sending a long to sending a string or just do what I said before and send the title as a separate string.

Read full topic

item.title: [317refactor] Player title showoff
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:550770”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=669681.msg4477993#msg4477993 date=1427401510]
Not text added to a username at all, it’s handled completely differently will show more later
[/quote]
…
Where does the title get displayed?

Next to the username, or somewhere else?
Next to the username.

So, by that logic, it’s “Text added to the username”[/quote]

Yes but it required quite a large modification list to the client to get it working - it was not just as simple as adding it to the username.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:550770”]So. What’s being shown off here…?

No offence. All a title is, is text added to the username…

Are they live updating like on RS? Is there an interface to switch titles?

I get that you’re doing all these things to your client… But like… Show something new?[/quote]

Not text added to a username at all, it’s handled completely differently will show more later
